mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gpu_data (id, name, price, g3d, g2d, value, tdp, power_perf, date, cat, bus, mem_size, core_clk, mem_clk, `rank`, samples, href, output) VALUES
(#{gpuData.id}, #{gpuData.name}, #{gpuData.price}, #{gpuData.g3d}, #{gpuData.g2d}, #{gpuData.value}, #{gpuData.tdp}, #{gpuData.powerPerf}, #{gpuData.date}, #{gpuData.cat}, #{gpuData.bus}, #{gpuData.memSize}, #{gpuData.coreClk}, #{gpuData.memClk}, #{gpuData.rank}, #{gpuData.samples}, #{gpuData.href}, #{gpuData.output})
